name: Capelobo
description:
According to the story, its tapir head and muzzle; human body, with strong arms and legs; height of approximately two meters; round paws; and hair all over the body. He is very fast and likes to run through the woods near rivers and floodplains. He usually surrounds houses or tents located in the middle of the forest, at night. It makes a loud roar and prefers to feed on dogs and cats, especially newborns.

Capelobo also likes to attack hunters, often ends up killing and drinking the blood of victims. The legend has a lot of resemblance to that of the Werewolf, which is why, for some folklorists, it is considered a species of werewolf in the north of the country. The only way to kill this being is to hit him in the navel. <Crypto Legends | A Series by Renancio Monte | 2021>
